title: Claude Code SessionEnd Hook Output Schema
description: Expected JSON schema for Claude Code SessionEnd hook output. NOTE: SessionEnd is not yet supported by Claude Code as of 2025-01. See: https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code/hooks

hookEventName.description: Must be 'SessionEnd' to match the hook event type

additionalContext.description: Optional context (may not be used since SessionEnd is not yet supported)

notes: SessionEnd hook type is NOT YET SUPPORTED by Claude Code
The current implementation uses mcp_client.py directly instead of HTTP
Schema included for future-proofing when SessionEnd becomes available
